Kencan is a Premium and High-Quality UI Kit of Dating, Social Media, Chat, Love, Meet App UI Kit with many features. Kencan came with unique style and niche, you can easily edit and customize all elements with design components which can speed up design process for your projects.


Kencan - Dating App UI Kit is equipped with iOS/Android support (design system included) and 110 screens which is 100% editable & customizable. Designs are available in Figma. In addition, the design is also equipped with a version of Light & Dark Theme.


Kencan is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. Kencan is equipped with a design system with hundred of components. The Design System has been equipped with typography, iconography, color styles, components, elements, buttons, input forms, alerts, avatars, checkboxes, chips, grids, toggles, and many others.


In addition, the application design in figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to edit, delete, or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


The design is available in my:

Gumroad | UI8


Suitable for :

  • Dating App
  • Social Media App
  • Messaging App
  • Meet App


App Features:

  • Find a match that suits you
  • Find and filter your match as you like
  • Find a match around you with the maps
  • Messaging, voice & video calls support
  • And many more features


Product Highlights:

  • 110 Screens (iOS/Android Support)
  • 100% Editable & Customizable
  • Compatibility: Figma
  • Light & Dark Theme Included
  • Big Design System & Hundred of Components
  • Fully Auto Layout
  • Well Organized Layers System
  • Unique, Stylish & Modern
  • Used Google Free Fonts
  • Used Grid System
  • Pixel Perfect Design
  • Global Styleguide
  • Easily Drag & Drop Design
